title: Russians fled Chernobyl with radiation sickness, says Ukraine as IAEA investigates
content:
1. Russians fled Chernobyl with radiation sickness, says Ukraine as IAEA investigates  The Guardian
  2. Russian troops have withdrawn from Chernobyl, says Ukrainian nuclear operator  CNN
  3. Russians leaving Chernobyl as fighting rages elsewhere  WGN News
  4. Russian Troops Suffer ‘Acute Radiation Sickness’ After Digging Chernobyl Trenches  Yahoo News
  5. All Russians left Chernobyl: Ukraine nuclear firm  Reuters
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
Russians fled Chernobyl with radiation sickness, says Ukraine as IAEA investigates  The Guardian
Russian troops have withdrawn from Chernobyl, says Ukrainian nuclear operator  CNN

localize.title: ロシア人は放射線病でチェルノブイリから逃げたと、IAEAの調査にウクライナは言う。
乌克兰称俄罗斯人带着辐射病逃离切尔诺贝利，因为IAEA正在调查
烏克蘭稱俄羅斯人帶着輻射病逃離切爾諾貝利，因爲IAEA正在調查
